title: GiliSoft Video Converter 8.7.0 + Keygen REPT
description:
================
 [INFO:]
================

GiliSoft Video Converter 8.7.0 + Keygen REPT | 12.3 MB

GiliSoft Video Converter is easy, fast, reliable, and loaded with features. It's capable of converting videos of all popular formats like AVI, MPEG, WMV, DivX, MP4, H.264/AVC, AVCHD, MKV, RM, MOV, XviD, 3GP, and audio MP3, WMA, WAV, RA, M4A, AAC, AC3, OGG. Now you can convert video, audio, and animated images to play on your PSP, PS3, iPod, iPhone, Apple TV, Xbox, Google phones, iPad and other digital multimedia devices.


Features and Benefits:

-Convert video to video
-Convert videos various formats;
-Convert HD videos to common formats;
-Converted video are compatible with iPad, iPod, iPhone, PSP, PS3, Android phones, etc.

-Convert video to audio
Extract audio from video as m4a, wma, wav, mp3, aac, ac3, ape, mka, ogg, etc;

-Convert audio to audio
Convert audios to various formats;

-Cut/trim video
Trim your video files to convert your favorite movie clips;

-Cut/trim audio

-Crop Video
Crop video to create ideal video with different screen size;

-Rotate Video

-Add watermark to Video
Add either text or image as watermark to coin and color your video files;

-Add subtitle to Video
Add and edit subtitle with .MKV as source file and plug-in subtitle in SRT format to your video.

-Preview and capture pictures

-Edit videos freely as you wish
Set video brightness, contrast, saturation and volume as you like.

-Advanced setting and optimized profiles
Configure output video/audio settings such as Resolution, Frame Rate, Encoder, Sample Rate, and Bit Rate to produce exactly the wanted video/audio for mobile devices;



Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
Language : English
 
 

================
[INSTALL NOTES]
================
1. Install program 
2. Open Keygen,choose your product and generate a serial
3. Open program and register it with any email and serial generated before
4. Add these entries to your host file C:WindowsSystem32Driversetc

127.0.0.1 www.gilisoft.com
127.0.0.1 gilisoft.com

5. Done
6. Enjoy!


NOTE: Keygens, patches, Activators, Cracks, Loaders etc. are always scanned with
      Kaspersky Internet Security 2014 Latest Version to Avoid Virus 
      issues.
